parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of the definition. Useful for reusing definitions.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: List of fields to be included in the operation.

parameter.name: autoDeleteDuration
parameter.description: Time until the definition will be deleted.

parameter.name: isUpdatingMultipleMatchedRecords
parameter.description: Specifies whether Eloqua should update multiple records if multiple records match the identifierFieldName.

parameter.name: createdAt
parameter.description: Timestamp when the definition was created.

parameter.name: dataRetentionDuration
parameter.description: Time until the staged data will be deleted.

parameter.name: identifierFieldName
parameter.description: Specifies which field to use to match the imported data to existing Eloqua data.

parameter.name: kbUsed
parameter.description: The amount of space required to store staged data.

parameter.name: updateRule
parameter.description: Specifies how updates should be handled.

parameter.name: syncActions
parameter.description: Specifies additional operations to import or export.

parameter.name: updatedAt
parameter.description: Timestamp when the definition was updated.

parameter.name: uri
parameter.description: System- generated URI that defines the definition for future referencing.

parameter.name: isSyncTriggeredOnImport
parameter.description: Specifies whether automatically syncs the data into Eloqua.
